title: Improvements in trade receivables of power utilities expected: Fitch
description: Fitch Ratings anticipates an improvement in trade receivables for Indian power utilities, particularly from weaker state-owned distribution companies (discoms), and highlights the pace of capital expenditure (capex) as a key credit driver for rated power utilities in the near to medium term.
